title: Christmas Eve Nativity Service
deck: A perfect event for all the family.
article:
Join us 3pm Christmas Eve (Thursday 24th December) on YouTube at: <https://youtu.be/d3vK5oJo9Bo>

We'll be premiering our Christmas Eve Nativity Service, complete with your videos and pictures! 

Send a short (no more than 30 seconds) video of your household dressed up as characters from the nativity story, or pictures youâ€™ve drawn of the nativity story by Sunday 20th December and we will include them during our Christmas Eve Nativity Service. 

Send your videos or pictures to: nativity@gatewaychurch.co.uk.

\-by sending a video or picture you are agreeing for this to be shared publicly on the YouTube platform.

\-all videos and pictures need to be landscape to be used. 

\-videos will be displayed during the carols so the sound will not be used.
